title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: A banker wrongly imprisoned forms an unlikely friendship and engineers a patient, decades-long plan for freedom and dignity.

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son amid betrayal and family loyalty.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: Batman faces the Joker, a chaotic criminal mastermind who pushes Gotham and its hero to ethical limits.

title: Inception
plot: A skilled thief enters dreams to steal secrets but must plant an idea while navigating layers of subconscious reality.

title: Interstellar
plot: Explorers travel via a wormhole to save humanity while a father and daughter are bound by time and gravity.

title: Parasite
plot: A poor family infiltrates a wealthy household, exposing class divisions through darkly comic twists.

title: Spirited Away
plot: A ten-year-old girl enters a spirit world and must work to free her parents and return home.

title: Lagaan
plot: Villagers in colonial India challenge British officers to a game of cricket to avoid steep taxes.

title: Dangal
plot: A former wrestler trains his daughters to become world-class champions against social odds.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning
plot: A young man discovers his royal heritage and fights to reclaim a kingdom lost to treachery.

title: 3 Idiots
plot: Three engineering students navigate friendship, pressure, and the pursuit of passion over rote success.

title: Andhadhun
plot: A pianist feigns blindness and stumbles into a web of crime and deception.

title: Drishyam
plot: A man goes to extreme lengths to protect his family after an unexpected crime.

title: Jab We Met
plot: An impulsive young woman and a depressed businessman embark on an unexpected journey of self-discovery.

title: BARFI!
plot: A charming mute-deaf man and an autistic woman find love and acceptance in unconventional ways.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a rebel fights a tyrant in a high-speed convoy chase to freedom.

title: Whiplash
plot: An ambitious drummer clashes with a ruthless instructor in pursuit of greatness.

title: The Social Network
plot: The turbulent founding of Facebook tests friendships, ethics, and ambition.

title: Barbie
plot: Barbie leaves Barbieland for the real world, confronting identity and societal expectations with humor and meta style.

title: Oppenheimer
plot: J. Robert Oppenheimer leads the Manhattan Project, grappling with scientific brilliance and moral fallout.
